briefTitle: Evaluating Scaleup of an Adapted Breast Cancer Early Diagnosis Program in Rwanda
officialTitle: Evaluating Scaleup of an Adapted Breast Cancer Early Diagnosis Program in Rwanda
conditions: Breast Cancer, Benign Breast Disease, Cervix Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Number of patients presenting to health centers for CBA per week (Reach)
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* All individuals who are evaluated for a breast concern or receive breast cancer screening through implementation of the nationally-led early detection programs

Exclusion Criteria:

* None
